howToGetIt: S.F. Behavioral Health Access Line (24/7): (888) 246-3333 (TTY: 711) Psychiatric Emergency Services: (628) 206-8000 Mobile Crisis Team: (628) 217-7000 Comprehensive Child Crisis: (628) 217-7000 Westside Community Crisis: (415) 355-0311 S.F. Suicide Prevention: (415) 781-0500
cost: Serve individuals with low incomes, who are uninsured or have/qualify for Medicare, al, or San Francisco Health Plan
